card_text: If you control no monsters, or all monsters you control are Psychic and/or Wyrm monsters, you can Normal Summon this card without Tributing. If this card is in your GY: You can discard 1 Psychic or Wyrm monster; Special Summon this card as a Tuner, but banish it when it leaves the field, also for the rest of this turn, you can only Special Summon Level/Rank 3 or higher monsters. You can only use this effect of "Virtual World Oto-Hime - Toutou" once per turn.
